CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vinci Partners Investments Ltd is an alternative investment platform in Brazil. Its business segments include Private Market Strategies; Liquid Strategies; Investment Products and solutions AND Financial Advisory. The company's segment includes Private Market Strategies.
